title: Will officials at ILM look back into the direct flights to Bermuda that were in the works until the recession \shot down\" the plans?"
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/07/will-ilm-officials-look-into-direct-flights-to-bermuda-that-were-in-the-works-before-the-recession/
